title: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion
notes: Directly launching the game instead of launcher, crashes

title: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion
notes: A few fonts don't fit the UI elements properly. They are easily corrected by editing a couple of font files in the game's Font directory. Change the font heights as follows: ButtonLabel.font - 16, InfoCardStatement.font - 15, Label.font - 16

title: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion
notes: Works fine. FPS drops during gameplay down to the low 30s hurt the overall experience.

title: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion
notes: Fonts slightly bigger, saw 1 box where text didn't fit. Flashing cursor => fixed by "use hardware cursor".  Performance on par with windows.  Same stuttering in endgame (full fleet of carriers, large economy) when increasing game speed. Standard speed ok.

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) R9 380 Series (TONGA, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.6-1-MANJARO, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes:
Minor  font issues (little too big for their containers).
Flickering cursor => fixed by "use system cursor" setting.
Just as on windows, framerate deteriorates in end-game on large maps. It is slower than on windows, but not much
title: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion®

notes: Runs perfectly, performance is good. The launcher window seems a little dark, as if there's a light grey overlay on it, but it works and lets you launch the game.
title: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion®

notes: Updating previous report(platinum). The game launcher sometimes becomes invisible. It still responds to mouse input, so the game can be launched by mashing the area around the launch game button until you hit it, but doing so gets old fast. On the plus side mods seem to work perfectly.
title: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion®
